control.visible: [[!String.IsEqual(Window(Home).Property(ForceViewType),poster) + !String.IsEqual(Window(Home).Property(ForceViewType),wide)] | Skin.HasSetting(WideSeasonArt) + Container.Content(seasons)] + String.IsEmpty(Container.PluginName) + !Window.IsActive(tvrecordings) + [[Skin.HasSetting(WideMovieArt) + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets)]] | [Skin.HasSetting(WideTVShowArt) + Container.Content(tvshows)] | [Skin.HasSetting(WideSeasonArt) + Container.Content(seasons)]]
